categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Mission to Yitabo occurred during the Galactic Civil War on the planet Yitabo. A group of Imperial slavers captured a group of Wookiees. Aware of the capture, Churhee's Riflemen took steps to rescue the slaves. "Gunman" was sent to do reconnaissance, although he was captured by the Imperials. Despite this set-back, the Riflemen managed to release all the slaves who then took out their anger on their Imperial captors.
